  <description>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>d5d7bea9-9d3e-4ff2-887e-983a4798302c#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Állítsd össze a képet!</string>
            <string language="en">Put together the picture!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zusammengefügt der Abbildung!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Remonté l'image !</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unido o retrato!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unito l'immagine!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βάλτε μαζί την εικόνα!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Juntado el cuadro!</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A szabadságharc fontosabb hadműveletei 1848 nyarától 1849. február végéig</string>
            <string language="en">More important military operations of the war of independence from 1848 summer to the end of february in 1849</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">történelem, mozaik</string>
            <string language="en">history, mosaic</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wichtigere militärische Operationen des Krieges von 
Unabhängigkeit von Sommer 1848 zum Ende Februar 1849</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Des exécutions militaires plus importantes de la guerre 
de l'indépendance de l'été 1848 à fin février en 1849</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Operações militares mais importantes da guerra da 
independência do verão 1848 ao fim de fevereiro em 1849</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzionamenti militari più importanti della guerra di 
indipendenza da estate 1848 alla conclusione di febbraio in 1849</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημαντικότερες στρατιωτικές διαδικασίες της 
επανάστασης από το καλοκαίρι 1848 στο τέλος Φεβρουαρίου το 
1849</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Operaciones militares más importantes de la guerra de la 
independencia a partir del verano 1848 a finales de febrero en 1849</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte, Mosaik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire, mosaïque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history, mosaic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia, mosaico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia, mosaico</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>

            <entity>begin:vcard

    </metadata>
